column2: Choose a patron deity
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Mystryl, goddess of magic, knowledge and the Weaver
Amaunator, god of law and the sun.
Shar, goddess of darkness and the night.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Jannath, goddess of agriculture and life.
[Root.SeluneLoc], goddess of the moon, love and navigation.
Jergal, god of death, murder and strife.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Kozah, god of storms and destruction.
Tyche, goddess of luck, chance and accidents.
Targus, god of war and violence.
There are others...
Although the people of Faerûn honour many gods, you may choose to devote yourself to one of them in particular.
Moander, god of rot and decay.
There are others...
